plot outline: A girl rents a house during the pandemic and encounters weird experiences in the house. Her boyfriend surprises her at midnight. A series of mysterious incidents follow after which the girl is found dead by her boyfriend the next day. Is the house haunted? Why did the girl die unfolds at the end of the movie?
title: Meenakshi
